testcase.name: Successful_Completion_Of_Purchase_Order
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Successful completion of purchase order given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 7.173s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.1326s e when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.298s when User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.236s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.211s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.181s when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.212s then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.199s when User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 1.216s then User should see the order confirmation page with message Thank you for your order! ... passed in 0.008187s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
